text:
The NHS will contact you when it’s your turn to be vaccinated against Covid-19. 

Please wear loose clothing so the vaccine can easily be administered 💉
Please don't contact the NHS for a vaccination until you're invited👉 https://t.co/lUVTGZWDb6
#Sunderland #COVID19 #Vaccine https://t.co/aGK8X5qDx7
